meanings.definition: Relating to the endoplasmic reticulum within a cell.
meanings.sent1: The endoplasmic reticulum is an important part of the cell structure.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the endoplasmic reticulum to understand cell functions better.
meanings.sent3: The endoplasmic reticulum threw a party, and all the other cell organelles attended.
meanings.sent4: Her knowledge of the endoplasmic reticulum was as vast as the universe.
meanings.sent5: The endoplasmic reticulum hummed with activity, like a bustling city.
